item.title: EKC SILVER V.40 HAS BEEN RELEASED. IF YOU HAVENT UPDATED YET YOU SHOULD RECIEVE A PROMPT. IF THE DOWNLOAD IS INTERRUPTED, SIMPLY GO TO ADDONS THAN CLICK TO THE RIGHT TO EKC WIZARD - BUILD MENU- FRESH INSTALL - FORCE CLOSE WHEN DONE. EKC 40 HAS BEEN SIMPLIFIED TO JUST MOVIES AND TV SHOWS. NEW SCRAPERS ARE WORKING VERY WELL. IF YOU WANT SPORTS, LIVE TV, AND HIGHER QUALITY MOVIES IT IS BEST TO SUBSCRIBE TO EKC TV PREMIUM.
IF YOU WOULD LIKE A CABLE LIKE EXPERIENCE WITH EVERY CHANNEL, SPORTING PACKAGE, AND LOCAL NEWS, GO TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/EKCTV NOW AND SIGN UP!.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
